title: Insights from CircularTech Forum — The Global DPP Community Meets in Cologne
subtitle: 5 key takeaways from the world's leading event on Digital Product Passports
featuredImageAlt: CircularTech Forum Cologne — the global community on Digital Product Passports
excerpt: On September 22nd I joined the CircularTech Forum in Cologne — the event for the global DPP community. Here are 5 insights I walked away with, from 90% of EU products requiring DPPs to why being early is a superpower.
